summary:
Beastie Boys were a popular American hip-hop group from New York City, formed in 1981. The group consisted of three members: Ad-Rock, MCA, and Mike D. They started as a punk band but switched to hip-hop after achieving local success. Their debut album, "Licensed to Ill," was a huge hit, becoming the first rap album to reach number one on the Billboard chart.

Over their career, they released many successful albums and sold millions of records. They were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2012 but disbanded after MCA's death from cancer in the same year.
title: Beastie Boys
